CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Personal_Relation__c)="Trusted personal relationship", IMAGE("/resource/1708162574000/Flags/Flags/png/01_flag_green.png","Trusted personal relationship"), IF(TEXT(Personal_Relation__c)="Business meeting relationship", IMAGE("/resource/1708162574000/Flags/Flags/png/02_flag_yellow.png","Business meeting relationship"), IF(TEXT(Personal_Relation__c)="No relationship", IMAGE("/resource/1708162574000/Flags/Flags/png/03_flag_red.png","No relationship"), IMAGE("/resource/1708162574000/Flags/Flags/png/03_flag_red.png","Unknown"))))
CustomField.label: Relation
